channel.title: Really Simple
channel.description:
Well if someone gets kicked i want it so it shows the time and who kicked who example:
player1: wow yuh faking batch! mod: kicked!
yell ( dunno what code comes here?); so it actually says [11:15] Mod has kicked player1
i know how to yell trough the server only don't know how to show up the name who gets kicked who kicks and the time! Any help is appreciated!

item.title: Really Simple
item.dc:creator: @Ryanz Ryanz
item.description:
@Ryanz wrote:

Nah doesn’t work well this time i only want it like it shows the playername who kicks and the player who gets kicked doesn’t anyone know that?

such as

Mod kicked player1 ??!?!

Read full topic

item.title: Really Simple
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + ": Kicking Player: " + command.substring(5);

Something like that. You will most likely need to change some things around.

Read full topic

item.title: Really Simple
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

then change the +playername+ to your variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Really Simple
item.dc:creator: @Ryanz Ryanz
item.description:
@Ryanz wrote:

That command said instead of the names it said:

+Playername has kicked +Playername

i figured how to do it so it shows who kicked anyone but it doesnt show like who he kicks

example:

Mod kicked +playername [fail?]

Read full topic

item.title: Really Simple
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

yell(+playername+ has kicked +playername")

try something like that.

For the time you will probably have to create a new method.

Read full topic
